setValidationStatus

public void setValidationStatus(boolean isWellFormed,
                                boolean isValid)
Description copied from interface: View
Sets the validation and well-formed status. When set to true, the inputOk image is shown, when set to false, the inputNotOk image is shown.

Specified by:
setValidationStatus in interface View
Parameters:
isWellFormed - true if input is well formed, false otherwise
isValid - true if input is valid, false otherwise
